trans-unit.source: Let's create your first product
trans-unit.target: Let's create your first product

trans-unit.source: What do you want to tell about it? Think about what your customers want to know.
trans-unit.target: What do you want to tell about it? Think about what your customers want to know.

trans-unit.source: Add clear and attractive information. Don't worry, you can edit it later :)
trans-unit.target: Add clear and attractive information. Don't worry, you can edit it later :)

trans-unit.source: Give your product a catchy name.
trans-unit.target: Give your product a catchy name.

trans-unit.source: Fill out the essential details in this tab. The other tabs are for more advanced information.
trans-unit.target: Fill out the essential details in this tab. The other tabs are for more advanced information.

trans-unit.source: Add one or more pictures so your product looks tempting!
trans-unit.target: Add one or more pictures so your product looks tempting!

trans-unit.source: How much do you want to sell it for?
trans-unit.target: How much do you want to sell it for?

trans-unit.source: Yay! You just created your first product. Looks good, right?
trans-unit.target: Yay! You just created your first product. Looks good, right?

trans-unit.source: Give your shop its own identity
trans-unit.target: Give your shop its own identity

trans-unit.source: How do you want your shop to look? What makes it so special?
trans-unit.target: How do you want your shop to look? What makes it so special?

trans-unit.source: Customize your theme or choose the best design from our theme catalog.
trans-unit.target: Customize your theme or choose the best design from our theme catalog.

trans-unit.source: A good way to start is to add your own logo here!
trans-unit.target: A good way to start is to add your own logo here!

trans-unit.source: If you want something really special, have a look at the theme catalog!
trans-unit.target: If you want something really special, have a look at the theme catalog!

trans-unit.source: Get your shop ready for payments
trans-unit.target: Get your shop ready for payments

trans-unit.source: How do you want your customers to pay you?
trans-unit.target: How do you want your customers to pay you?

trans-unit.source: These payment methods are already available to your customers.
trans-unit.target: These payment methods are already available to your customers.

trans-unit.source: Adapt your offer to your market: add the most popular payment methods for your customers!
trans-unit.target: Adapt your offer to your market: add the most popular payment methods for your customers!

trans-unit.source: And you can choose to add other payment methods from here!
trans-unit.target: And you can choose to add other payment methods from here!

trans-unit.source: Choose your shipping solutions
trans-unit.target: Choose your shipping solutions

trans-unit.source: How do you want to deliver your products?
trans-unit.target: How do you want to deliver your products?

trans-unit.source: Here are the shipping methods available on your shop today.
trans-unit.target: Here are the shipping methods available on your shop today.

trans-unit.source: Select the shipping solutions the most likely to suit your customers! Create your own carrier or add a ready-made module.
trans-unit.target: Select the shipping solutions the most likely to suit your customers! Create your own carrier or add a ready-made module.

trans-unit.source: You can offer more delivery options by setting up additional carriers
trans-unit.target: You can offer more delivery options by setting up additional carriers

trans-unit.source: Improve your shop with modules
trans-unit.target: Improve your shop with modules

trans-unit.source: Add new features and manage existing ones thanks to modules.
trans-unit.target: Add new features and manage existing ones thanks to modules.

trans-unit.source: Some modules are already pre-installed, others may be free or paid modules - browse our selection and find out what is available!
trans-unit.target: Some modules are already pre-installed, others may be free or paid modules - browse our selection and find out what is available!

trans-unit.source: Discover our module selection in the first tab. Manage your modules on the second one and be aware of notifications in the third tab.
trans-unit.target: Discover our module selection in the first tab. Manage your modules on the second one and be aware of notifications in the third tab.

trans-unit.source: Skip this tutorial
trans-unit.target: Skip this tutorial

trans-unit.source: Over to you!
trans-unit.target: Over to you!

trans-unit.source: You've seen the essential, but there's a lot more to explore.
trans-unit.target: You've seen the essential, but there's a lot more to explore.

trans-unit.source: Some ressources can help you go further:
trans-unit.target: Some ressources can help you go further:

trans-unit.target: Starter Guide

trans-unit.target: Forum

trans-unit.source: I'm ready
trans-unit.target: I'm ready

trans-unit.source: Welcome to your shop!
trans-unit.target: Welcome to your shop!

trans-unit.source: Hi! My name is Preston and I'm here to show you around.
trans-unit.target: Hi! My name is Preston and I'm here to show you around.

trans-unit.source: You will discover a few essential steps before you can launch your shop:
trans-unit.target: You will discover a few essential steps before you can launch your shop:

trans-unit.source: Create your first product, customize your shop, configure shipping and payments...
trans-unit.target: Create your first product, customize your shop, configure shipping and payments...

trans-unit.source: Let's get started!
trans-unit.target: Let's get started!

trans-unit.source: Later
trans-unit.target: Later

trans-unit.target: Start

trans-unit.source: Launch your shop!
trans-unit.target: Launch your shop!

trans-unit.target: Stop the OnBoarding

trans-unit.target: Hey! Are you lost?

trans-unit.target: To continue, click here:
